scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:seller" "npm run dev:creator" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.dev:creator: cd creator-panel && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:seller && npm run build:creator
scripts.build:creator: cd creator-panel && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin-web && npm install && cd ../seller-panel && npm install && cd ../creator-panel && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:creator: docker compose up creator-panel -d
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:admin
